headline.main: One for the Ages: At 58, Langer Is a Masters Contender
headline.print_headline: One for the Ages: At 58, Langer Is a Masters Contender

docs.snippet: On the 30th anniversary of Jack Nicklaus' final Masters victory, another ageless blond is making a run at the green jacket....

headline.main: Jack Sock, Juan Monaco Reach US Men's Clay Court Final
headline.print_headline: Jack Sock, Juan Monaco Reach US Men's Clay Court Final

docs.snippet: Fourth-seeded defending champion Jack Sock beat top-seeded John Isner 7-6 (4), 6-3 on Saturday in an all-American semifinal in the U.S. Men's Clay Court Championship....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fourth-seeded defending champion Jack Sock beat top-seeded John Isner 7-6 (4), 6-3 on Saturday in an all-American semifinal in the U.S. Men's Clay Court Championship.

headline.main: Mexico: Austrian Lab Finds No Evidence of Missing Students
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Austrian Lab Finds No Evidence of Missing Students

docs.snippet: An Austrian laboratory has not found evidence that can confirm that remains found in a trash dump in the southern Mexican state of Guerrero belong to 43 students who disappeared in September 2014, authorities announced....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Austrian laboratory has not found evidence that can confirm that remains found in a trash dump in the southern Mexican state of Guerrero belong to 43 students who disappeared in September 2014, authorities announced.

headline.main: Rebels and Syrian Government Forces Battle in Fierce Clashes Near Aleppo: Monitor
headline.print_headline: Rebels and Syrian Government Forces Battle in Fierce Clashes Near Aleppo: Monitor

docs.snippet: Syrian government forces and their allies battled insurgents including al Qaeda fighters in fierce clashes south of Aleppo late on Saturday, and the rebels advanced taking over two hilltops, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Syrian government forces and their allies battled insurgents including al Qaeda fighters in fierce clashes south of Aleppo late on Saturday, and the rebels advanced taking over two hilltops, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said.

headline.main: Ruthless Joshua Claims IBF World Heavyweight Crown
headline.print_headline: Ruthless Joshua Claims IBF World Heavyweight Crown

docs.snippet: Britain's Anthony Joshua lived up to his billing as the new superstar of heavyweight boxing when he stopped Charles Martin in the second round with a demonstration of brutal power to claim the American’s world IBF title on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's Anthony Joshua lived up to his billing as the new superstar of heavyweight boxing when he stopped Charles Martin in the second round with a demonstration of brutal power to claim the American’s world IBF title on Saturday.

docs.snippet: The Internet giant must do a better job of enforcing its gun sale ban....
docs.abstract: Editorial warns Facebook is being used to circumvent domestic gun laws and as way to facilitate international arms trade; calls on company to take necessary steps to halt practice both internationally and domestically.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Internet giant must do a better job of enforcing its gun sale ban.
